metadata: (info { (description "Sua Ghin Gnua is a game played in Thailand. It was equated with the game Lay Gwet Kyah, but not described.") (rules "5x5 intersecting lines. Likely to be a hunt game.") (source "DLP evidence.") (id "1090") (version "1.3.14") (classification "board/hunt/reconstruction/pending") (credit "Eric Piette") (origin "This game was played in Thailand, around 1898.") } ) (graphics { (show Edges Diagonal Hidden) })
